text: I enjoyed my German lessons with Anja at Eurolingo very much. Although the main focus of our lessons was to prepare me for language exams to study in Germany, Anja was always open to tailoring my lessons to focus on certain topics of interest to me, which made German learning a thoroughly enriching experience!

Have been taking beginner 1-3 classes with María :) Classes with her are always really engaging. She’s patient when teaching us and takes the time to help us understand. She motivates me to learn the language and keep practicing. I really couldn’t ask for a better Spanish teacher

Started my Spanish language journey with Maria back in April and so glad I did! We learn in a small group setting which is perfect for engagement and Maria does such an amazing job explaining the language, culture, and helping me with all my many questions.

There is a good balance of grammar, vocab, written/ reading exercises, speaking opportunities, and games.

Attending this Spanish class with Maria and our lovely group has been a weekly highlight for me this year! Can't wait to continue.

I've been taking Adult German A1 classes with Anja this past year and it has been an incredibly supportive, well-paced and well thought out curriculum. Anja takes care to create a light hearted and open environment where students are free to practice and laugh at their own mistakes.

She has over a decade of experience teaching German to both young learners and adults locally, and is extremely adaptable and tailors her classes to fit students of different demographics. I always appreciate the cultural nuances and little tidbits and fun facts she dispenses during class.
Professor maria was a great teacher. She was good at explaining whenever we have difficulty understanding. Thank you professora maria!
